EditTextPreference.android:title: Max Speed
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The maximum speed that the RC car can go. Must be between 0 and 253.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Max Acceleration
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The maximum acceleration that the RC car can endure.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Reverse Motor Direction
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Whether or not to switch the direction the motor considers to be forwards.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Center Angle
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The angle at which the servo motor causes the wheels to point perfectly straight. Increase if pulling to left, and decrease if pulling to right.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Angular Velocity
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The angular velocity at which the servo motor rotates.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Max Angular Displacement
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The largest angle that the servo can turn from the Center Angle.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Braking Torque To Engine Torque Ratio
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The ratio of the strengths of the brakes and engine when both are maxed out.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Debug Mode
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: When turned on, no commands will be sent to the Arduino.
